name: INFINITE TRASH FORTRESS OF DEATH
description:
Welcome to the INFINITE TRASH FORTRESS OF DEATH! Abandon all hope and all Efforts to find meaning in Life, there is only Death & Judgement. But also Loot. So... 

ITFOD is a deliberately punishing, but simple Turn Based 2D Dungeon Crawler Prototype. 

There is currently only Placeholder Content and all art be replaced. Most of the Systems are implemented in their basic form and i'm looking for Feedback on them to iron out any Bugs or change whatever else does not work as it should.  Controls:  If you'd like to support me, feel free to leave a comment. The less filtered, the better :)
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Interact
  • ESC - Inventory
